bibl.title: Ancient Egypt and Antique Europe. Two Parts of the Mediterranean World. Papers from a Session Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Seventh Annual Meeting in Esslingen 2001
bibl.note: See pp. 39-41: Zenon Papyrus, P. Athen. Mus. Nat. Inv. AIG 3405 (= S.B. V, 8244); 2 groups of wrestlers (Ptolemaic bronzes); granite head of Ptolemy VI Philometor; marble statue of Antinous; Fayoum portrait (IVth cent. A.D.).
CLADAKI-MANOLI Eleni, Margarita NICOLAKAKI-KENTROU and Eleni TOURNA, Egyptian Thesauri in the National Archaeological Museum of Athens. Avec résumé en anglais.

Amanda-Alice MARAVELIA (Ed.), Ancient Egypt and Antique Europe. Two Parts of the Mediterranean World. Papers from a Session Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Seventh Annual Meeting in Esslingen 2001 = BAR International Series. 1052 (Oxford, 2002) pp. 31-56, 14 pll.
145.4 P. Athen. Mus. Nat. Inv. AIG 3405
